EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-04-11-Cloud Readiness Survey EMEA Send 2.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: FIXED: £25 Amazon Gift Card for a 5 Minute Survey | Cloud Readiness Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/2KFGWH8?marketo_f4l3unycbk=[marketo_f4l3unycbk_value]]]> {{lead.First Name:default=Hello}}, As you know, it is easy for vendors to come off as aggressive and transactional. At Turbonomic our mission is to be far more than that. This is why we want to take a step back, let you know that we understand your time is extremely valuable and extend an offer to partner with you. We are excited to announce the launch of our Cloud Readiness Survey. <[[https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/2KFGWH8?marketo_f4l3unycbk=[marketo_f4l3unycbk_value]]]> We are offering a £25 Amazon gift card for completing the 5 minute survey by April 13th.
<[[https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/2KFGWH8?marketo_f4l3unycbk=[marketo_f4l3unycbk_value]]]> - The Turbonomic Team
